      • DrawPlayer

        void DrawPlayer(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                long lDelta)
        Draws the player if the player isn't a spectator, then moves the player if said player is SELF. If said player is SELF and is either dead or a spectator, this simply moves the camera and draws a centered square.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas used by the layout
        lDelta - The time since the last movement
